8463521d-d1d5-4211-86be-41e8c569e02d.description: Elastic Path Commerce Certified Developers are proficient in extending the Core Commerce functionality to meet the customization requirements for development projects. They have a deep understanding of the enterprise architecture, the core development process, and how to develop and extend the cortex API, helix resources, production tools, and integration tests for customizing Elastic Path Commerce.
8463521d-d1d5-4211-86be-41e8c569e02d.name: Elastic Path Commerce Certified Developer

badge_template_activities.title: Completion of the Extension Development learning path.
Learners must submit coding exercises from an assigned case study.

96442aa9-4a68-44a0-af6a-a916dc349ed5.description: Earners of this badge have demonstrated an understanding of the Commerce Cloud API. They are able to make API requests and validate the responses for Authentication, Products, Settings, Promotions, Carts, Customers, Checkout, Payments, and Orders.
96442aa9-4a68-44a0-af6a-a916dc349ed5.name: Elastic Path Commerce Cloud API Graduate

badge_template_activities.title: Complete the Understanding the API course.

4517d95f-424c-42c5-8145-7dcaeb057546.description: Earners of this badge have demonstrated an understanding of Data Extensions in Elastic Path Commerce Cloud. They are able to create customizations such as Flows, Fields, Entries, and Relationships.
4517d95f-424c-42c5-8145-7dcaeb057546.name: Elastic Path Commerce Cloud Data Schema Customizations Graduate

badge_template_activities.title: Complete the Extending Data Schema with Flows course.

80f711d5-5272-4945-9203-2fe41574ed33.description: Earners of this badge have demonstrated an understanding of using events and webhooks for integrations across systems and third-party tools. They are able to create a webhook integration for an observable event and process events using serverless functions in order to extend Elastic Path Commerce Cloud.
80f711d5-5272-4945-9203-2fe41574ed33.name: Elastic Path Commerce Cloud Events and Webhooks Graduate

badge_template_activities.title: Complete the Extending with Events and Webhooks course

c70501d5-4a89-4d83-886f-5cfc278c77a9.description: Earners of this badge have demonstrated an understanding of how to install Serverless Framework Open Source, develop a serverless application/service, deploy the serverless application with Serverless Framework, and test the serverless application with a Webhook integration.
c70501d5-4a89-4d83-886f-5cfc278c77a9.name: Serverless Functions Graduate

badge_template_activities.title: Complete the Building Your Solutions with Serverless Functions course.

0c326d9e-c179-4b5e-88a6-5ff077b39457.description: Earners of the Elastic Path Commerce Cloud Developer Specialist designation are proficient in the Elastic Path Commerce Cloud ecosystem of micro-services. They are competent in using the Commerce Cloud API, creating data extensions, and developing back-end integrations with events, webhooks and serverless functions. Earners are also proficient in implementations for front-end solutions like checkout, payment methods, tax providers and more.
0c326d9e-c179-4b5e-88a6-5ff077b39457.name: Elastic Path Commerce Cloud Developer Specialist

badge_template_activities.title: Elastic Path Commerce Cloud API Graduate

ae9ee493-8198-421a-bd58-cd398062c35c.description: Earners of this badge have gained knowledge Product Content Management features in Elastic Path Cloud Commerce Manager. They have been introduced to the concepts of Products, Catalogs, Price Books, Hierarchies, and how these all work together for businesses to manage their product content.
ae9ee493-8198-421a-bd58-cd398062c35c.name: Elastic Path Commerce Cloud Product Content Management Graduate

badge_template_activities.title: Complete the Commerce Cloud Product Content Management course.

df93890d-b29d-433a-8cf5-201291aade4f.description: Earners of the Elastic Path Commerce Cloud Solution Architect Specialist designation have developed their knowledge of Elastic Path Commerce Cloud and architectural design in an ecosystem of micro-services. They have also practised designing using knowledge of the Commerce Cloud API, product modeling techniques, and the different customization options to connect with third-party applications.
df93890d-b29d-433a-8cf5-201291aade4f.name: Elastic Path Commerce Cloud Solution Architect Specialist

a452f55a-0641-4076-aa2e-03fdb0a6cb77.description: Earners of this badge have demonstrated an understanding of the Composable Commerce Architecture and how integrations with third-party applications are achieved through extensions with data schema customizations, webhooks, and serverless functions.
a452f55a-0641-4076-aa2e-03fdb0a6cb77.name: Composable Commerce Architecture Graduate

badge_template_activities.title: Complete the Composable Commerce Architecture course.

5ebd49e2-bab7-44c8-a729-bccb362a3cf5.description: Earners of this badge are proficient in the Elastic Path Cortex API. They have knowledge of Cortex, and how Cortex uses operations, hypermedia controls and hypermedia links to associate related resources together.
5ebd49e2-bab7-44c8-a729-bccb362a3cf5.name: Elastic Path Commerce Cortex API Graduate

skills.name: Front-end Development Using Elastic Path Studio

6d866a1a-f411-4ca0-a680-16c231a01148.description: Earners of this badge have understanding in designing solutions with Elastic Path core commerce functionality using design patterns, best practices, and industry design principles for composable commerce. They have a deep understanding of architecture, commerce functionality, and solution design for Elastic Path Commerce.
6d866a1a-f411-4ca0-a680-16c231a01148.name: Elastic Path Commerce Solution Architecture Graduate

badge_template_activities.title: Completion of the Solution Architecture learning path

1ee947f3-b9e1-44fe-b1b3-531259f49436.description: Earners of this badge are proficient in the different tools available in data management activities for Elastic Path Commerce. They have knowledge of how Elastic Path protects data, uses production tools for data integrations, synchronizations, import and export.
1ee947f3-b9e1-44fe-b1b3-531259f49436.name: Elastic Path Commerce Data Management Technology Graduate

badge_template_activities.title: Completion of the Data Management Technology learning path.

9e80dbfd-41d5-4d56-8a86-c1df6f89bd0b.description: Earners of this badge are proficient in B2B functions in Elastic Path Commerce. They have knowledge of commerce features for B2B businesses including Account Management concepts and functions in Commerce Manager.
9e80dbfd-41d5-4d56-8a86-c1df6f89bd0b.name: Elastics Path Commerce B2B Foundations Graduate

badge_template_activities.title: Completion of the B2B Foundations learning path.

7929ee62-d43a-4988-95e7-36d3081398af.description: Elastic Path Commerce Certified Solution Architects are proficient in designing solutions with Elastic Path core commerce functionality using design patterns, best practices, and industry design principles for composable commerce. They have a deep understanding of architecture, commerce functionality, and solution design for Elastic Path Commerce.
7929ee62-d43a-4988-95e7-36d3081398af.name: Elastic Path Commerce Certified Solution Architect

c115ee29-cdb6-4a09-afd9-528ddda9882e.description: Earners of this badge are proficient in Elastic Path CloudOps for Kubernetes. They are able to utilize automated tooling to run Elastic Path Commerce inside a Kubernetes cluster in a cloud-agnostic fashion to create highly scalable environments.
c115ee29-cdb6-4a09-afd9-528ddda9882e.name: Elastic Path Commerce CloudOps for Kubernetes Graduate

badge_template_activities.title: Completion of the Elastic Path Commerce: CloudOps for Kubernetes learning path.

6bc6e0f7-f1ef-4ecd-afd4-954de5f62701.description: Earners of this badge are proficient in Store and System Configurations in Elastic Path Commerce Manager. They have knowledge of how to configure the store, customer tags, attributes, shipping, taxes and other system configurations.
6bc6e0f7-f1ef-4ecd-afd4-954de5f62701.name: Elastic Path Commerce Store and System Configurations Graduate

badge_template_activities.title: Completion of the Store and System Configurations learning path.

4b3fbfa1-0dae-4b2c-b884-cc8197b62ccf.description: Elastic Path Commerce Certified Quality Assurance Engineers are proficient in runing automated test suites including the use of testing tools, creation and maintenance of test data. They have a deep understanding of architecture, commerce functionality, and extending the automated test suite to ensure customized code has quality test coverage.
4b3fbfa1-0dae-4b2c-b884-cc8197b62ccf.name: Elastic Path Commerce Certified Quality Assurance Engineer

badge_template_activities.title: Completion of the Quality Assurance learning path.

1b921c23-5628-4ba7-812d-7bbc2c9f1197.description: Earners of this badge have gained understanding in navigating, managing data and configuring the Commerce Manager business tool. They have developed their understanding of catalogs, selling contexts, basic and advanced product configurations, pricing, and promotions.
1b921c23-5628-4ba7-812d-7bbc2c9f1197.name: Elastic Path Commerce Catalog Management Graduate

cb408cbc-3052-4464-af2f-df0244670958.description: Earners of this badge are proficient in consuming Elastic Path Commerce data through Cortex and into the Reference Storefront experience. They have a deep understanding of architecture, commerce functionality, and front-end design for Elastic Path Commerce. They have understanding of best practices and workflows a developer should take regardless of the touchpoint.
cb408cbc-3052-4464-af2f-df0244670958.name: Elastic Path Commerce Reference Storefront Development Graduate

badge_template_activities.title: Completion of the Reference Storefront Development learning path.

627e3469-5245-4c2f-b93d-04b870c21db9.description: Certified Product Modeling Designers are proficient in modeling complex and varied product data in a composable commerce environment. They can serve as resources within their organization on product modeling principles in a modern composable commerce architecture including products, variations, catalogs, price books, and hierarchies. They have demonstrated experience in leveraging Product Experience Management to develop complex solutions within Elastic Path Commerce Cloud.
627e3469-5245-4c2f-b93d-04b870c21db9.name: Elastic Path Certified Product Modeling Designer

badge_template_activities.title: Completed Product Modeling Learning Plan

af72bc03-b9c4-4424-a302-a614f20a0818.description: Elastic Path Commerce Cloud Certified Functional Administrators are proficient in configuring and using the Elastic Path Commerce Cloud business tools. They are competent in creating and organizing product and pricing data, configuring promotions, managing customers and orders as well as understanding the settings of the Commerce Manager system and how these settings impact store functions.
af72bc03-b9c4-4424-a302-a614f20a0818.name: Elastic Path Commerce Cloud Certified Functional Administrator

badge_template_activities.title: Complete the Commerce Cloud Functional Administrator certification assessments

f0f8f86c-a21c-42f3-81f3-8edd88c89925.description: Elastic Path Commerce Certified Catalog Managers are proficient in navigating, managing data and using configuration options available in the Commerce Manager business tool. They have developed their understanding of catalogs, selling contexts, basic and advanced product configurations, pricing, and promotions and know how to leverage various configurations to support different sales models and scenarios.
f0f8f86c-a21c-42f3-81f3-8edd88c89925.name: Elastic Path Commerce Certified Catalog Manager

badge_template_activities.title: Completion of the Catalog Management practical exercises.

b07ff6a8-826b-4c95-becb-d6a330be3af6.description: Earners of this badge have completed the required training courses associated with each of their Discovery workshops/calls. They will demonstrate a high-level understanding of the associated topics in preparation for paricipating in these calls.
